scripts.clean: rimraf generated build && rimraf generated src/gen
scripts.build: yarn clean && yarn codegen && graph build
scripts.deploy:sepolia: yarn gen-networks-files && graph deploy --product hosted-service --network sepolia carrot-kpi/carrot-sepolia
scripts.deploy:gnosis: yarn gen-networks-files && graph deploy --product hosted-service --network gnosis carrot-kpi/carrot-gnosis
scripts.deploy:mumbai: yarn gen-networks-files && graph deploy --product hosted-service --network mumbai carrot-kpi/carrot-mumbai
